welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bayawan, Philippines, a charming city known for its natural beauty, warm hospitality, and diverse culture. We invite you to explore our beaches, waterfalls, and local cuisine and enjoy all that Bayawan has to offer.

restaurants.address: Rizal St (Magsaysay St), 6221 Bayawan City, Negros Oriental
